page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF FIONA 2
page.content: We enjoy our dinner because Auntie Ann makes lovely meals. We go outside after dinner. At 1.15 P.M. we usually have craft. At 2.15 P.M. we have another playtime which lasts for 15 mins . So at 2.30 P.M. we come in , do three quarters of an hour's work and go home. When I come home I watch children's I.T.V. I like children's I.T.V. because there are very good programmes on it. They have a different presenter every month. Presenters like Supergran or Roland Rat. After that I go upstairs and do a jigsaw or play a game or play with my brother Huw.
